name: Featured collection #10
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_align = section.settings.heading_align
  assign heading_align_mobile = section.settings.heading_align_mobile

  assign collection = section.settings.collection
  assign collection_show = section.settings.collection_show
  
  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile  
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile  
  
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  assign card_shadow_hover = section.settings.card_shadow_hover

  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign show_badge = section.settings.show_badge

  assign badge_padding_vertical = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical
  assign badge_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign badge_padding_horizontal = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal
  assign badge_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign badge_bg_color = section.settings.badge_bg_color
  assign badge_border_thickness = section.settings.badge_border_thickness
  assign badge_border_color = section.settings.badge_border_color
  assign badge_radius = section.settings.badge_radius
  
  assign badge_custom = section.settings.badge_custom
  assign badge_font = section.settings.badge_font
  assign badge_size = section.settings.badge_size
  assign badge_size_mobile = section.settings.badge_size_mobile
  assign badge_height = section.settings.badge_height
  assign badge_color = section.settings.badge_color  

  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif
  
  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color    

  assign price_size_mobile = section.settings.price_size_mobile
  assign price_size = section.settings.price_size
  assign price_color = section.settings.price_color
  assign price_original_color = section.settings.price_original_color
  assign price_custom = section.settings.price_custom
  assign price_font = section.settings.price_font
  assign price_height = section.settings.price_height
  assign price_compare = section.settings.price_compare
  assign price_mt = section.settings.price_mt
  assign price_mt_mobile = section.settings.price_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign media_arrow_size = section.settings.media_arrow_size
  assign media_arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.media_arrow_size_mobile
  assign media_arrow_icon_size = section.settings.media_arrow_icon_size
  assign media_arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.media_arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign media_arrow_color = section.settings.media_arrow_color
  assign media_arrow_hover_color = section.settings.media_arrow_hover_color
  assign media_arrow_bg_color = section.settings.media_arrow_bg_color
  assign media_arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.media_arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign media_arrow_radius = section.settings.media_arrow_radius
  assign media_arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.media_arrow_border_thickness
  assign media_arrow_border_color = section.settings.media_arrow_border_color
  assign media_arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.media_arrow_border_hover_color
  assign media_arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.media_arrow_show_desktop
  assign media_arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.media_arrow_show_mobile
  assign media_arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.media_arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ heading_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .featured-slider-body-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 15px;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    padding-top: 20px !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    flex: 1 1 auto !important;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    text-decoration: none;
    position: relative;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    z-index: 1 !important;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .featured-badge-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 16px;
    left: 16px;
    z-index: 2;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: fit-content;
    padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ badge_bg_color }};
    border: {{ badge_border_thickness }}px solid {{ badge_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ badge_radius }}px;
    padding: 10px;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ badge_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ badge_color }};
    word-break: break-word;
    line-height: {{ badge_height }}%;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .feautured-content-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;   
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
  }  

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}.out .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.5
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ price_mt_mobile }}px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ price_color }};
    line-height: {{ price_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    font-style: normal;
  }

  .featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0.8;
    font-size: {{ price_size_mobile | times: 0.8 }}px;
    color: {{ price_original_color }};
    text-decoration: line-through !important;
  } 

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}.out .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
    opacity: 0.5
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    z-index: 2;
    width: {{ media_arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ media_arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    padding: 0;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ media_arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ media_arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ media_arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ media_arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
    will-change: transform;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 10px;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 10px;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ media_arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ media_arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ media_arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ media_arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock,
  .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }  

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-lock {
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
  }

  .featured-media-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    z-index: -1 !important;
    padding: 0px {{ image_border_thickness }}px !important;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ heading_align }};
    }
  
    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-slider-body-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: 0px !important;
      margin-right: 0px !important;
      padding-left: 0px !important;
      padding-right: 0px !important;
    } 
    
    .featured-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ badge_padding_horizontal }}px;
      font-size: {{ badge_size }}px;
    }

    .feautured-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ content_padding_vertical }}px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
    }    

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ price_mt }}px;
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ price_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ media_arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ media_arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ media_arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ media_arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ media_arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if badge_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-badge-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ badge_font.family }}, {{ badge_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ badge_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ badge_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if price_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-price-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ price_font.family }}, {{ price_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ price_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ price_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if media_arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ media_arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ media_arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ media_arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ media_arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif media_arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif media_arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if media_arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if media_arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_shadow_hover %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        box-shadow: 0px 16px 16px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, .04);
        transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding: 30px 15px;    
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap | plus: 15 }}px;
    } 

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} featured-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">    
      <div class="featured-slider-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <button class="featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="featured-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper">
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% if collection != blank %}
              {% for product in collections[collection].products limit: collection_show %}
                <a href="{{ product.url }}" class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide {% unless product.available %}out{% endunless %}">    
                  {% if product.featured_image != blank %}  
                    {% if product.media.size > 1 %}
                      <div class="featured-media-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
                        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                          {% for media in product.media %}                          
                            <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">   
                              <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                    
                            </div>
                          {% endfor %}
                        </div>
                        <button class="featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
                        </button>
                        <button class="featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    {% else %}  
                      <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">    
                        <img src="{{ product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                    
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  {% else %}  
                    <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    </div>                
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if show_badge and product.metafields.custom.badge.value != blank %}
                    <p class="featured-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.metafields.custom.badge.value }}</p>  
                  {% endif %}
                  <div class="feautured-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    <p class="featured-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.title }}</p>                
                    <div class="featured-price-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p class="featured-regular-price-{{ section.id }}">{% if product != blank %}{{ product.price | money }}{% else %}$19.99{% endif %}</p>
                      {% if product.compare_at_price != blank and price_compare %}
                        <strong>-</strong> <p class="featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>   
                  </div>
                </a>
              {% endfor %}
            {% else %}
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                <{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.custom_url }}"{% elsif block.settings.product != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide {% if block.settings.product != blank and block.settings.product.available == false %}out{% endif %}">    
                  {% if block.settings.custom_image != blank %}
                    <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">    
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.custom_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.custom_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>            
                    </div>
                  {% elsif block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}  
                    {% if block.settings.product.media.size > 1 %}
                      <div class="featured-media-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
                        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
                          {% for media in block.settings.product.media %}                          
                            <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">   
                              <img src="{{ media | image_url }}" alt="{{ media.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                    
                            </div>
                          {% endfor %}
                        </div>
                        <button class="featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
                        </button>
                        <button class="featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    {% else %}  
                      <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">    
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>                    
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  {% else %}  
                    <div class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    </div>                
                  {% endif %} 
                  {% if show_badge and block.settings.badge != blank %}
                    <p class="featured-badge-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.badge }}</p>  
                  {% endif %}
                  <div class="feautured-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank or block.settings.product != blank %}
                      <p class="featured-title-{{ section.id }}">    
                        {% if block.settings.custom_title != blank %}    
                          {{ block.settings.custom_title }}
                        {% elsif block.settings.product != blank %}  
                          {{ block.settings.product.title }}
                        {% endif %}
                      </p>
                    {% endif %}                 
                    {% if block.settings.product != blank %}  
                     <div class="featured-price-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-regular-price-{{ section.id }}">{% if block.settings.product != blank %}{{ block.settings.product.price | money }}{% else %}$19.99{% endif %}</p>
                        {% if block.settings.product.compare_at_price != blank and price_compare %}
                          <strong>-</strong> <p class="featured-compare-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                </{% if block.settings.custom_url != blank or block.settings.product != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
              {% endfor %}
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>
        <button class="featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="animate-icon"></span>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedCollection10() {
    document.querySelector('.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview');
    const slider = new Swiper(".featured-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      pagination: {
        el: '.featured-pagination-{{ section.id }}',
        type: "bullets",
        clickable: true
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }},
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }},
        }
      }
    });

    const sliderMedia = new Swiper(".featured-media-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      slidesPerView: 1,
      spaceBetween: 10,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-media-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.featured-media-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
    })
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedCollection10);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedCollection10);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedCollection10);
  }
</script>

show_badge.label: Show badge
show_badge.description: Use metafield custom.bagde to show badge on product from the collection

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
